subject: Bloody Mary and Ouija
author: dc3644@aol.com
full_text:
--part1_6f586.bbab8a8.38fdc728_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hey guys,
 
I am doing some research on the Bloody Mary ritual and Ouija Boards. I am  
looking for anyone with stories or experiences from those that would be 
willing  to share them - as well as any research and evidence you may have 
gathered from  them. I am looking to bring the folklore together with the 
history, science and  experience.
 
Thanks.
 
Dwayne Claud
_Dwayne@..._ (mailto:Dwayne@...)
